code: import React from'react';import firebase from"firebase/compat/app";import"firebase/compat/auth";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faFacebook,faGithub,faGoogle}from'@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons';import{loginWithProvider}from'./LoginManager';import toast from'react-hot-toast';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SocialMedia=_ref=>{let{handleResponse}=_ref;const googleProvider=new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider();const fbProvider=new firebase.auth.FacebookAuthProvider();const ghProvider=new firebase.auth.GithubAuthProvider();const handleSignIn=provider=>{const loading=toast.loading('Please wait...');loginWithProvider(provider).then(res=>{if(res.error){toast.dismiss(loading);toast.error(res.error);}handleResponse(res);toast.dismiss(loading);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"social-media",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>handleSignIn(googleProvider),className:"social-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGoogle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>handleSignIn(fbProvider),className:"social-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faFacebook})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>handleSignIn(ghProvider),className:"social-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub})})]});};export default SocialMedia;
